text: Xerez C.D. is a football club which plays in Spain. The club formed from a merger of two football clubs ; Xerez FC and CD Jerez in 1947. Team colours are usually blue shirt and socks, and white shorts. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Segunda División B 3rd / Group 4 2001/02 Segunda División 4th 2002/03 Segunda División 6th 2003/04 Segunda División 9th 2004/05 Segunda División 8th 2005/06 Segunda División 6th 2006/07 Segunda División 8th 2007/08 Segunda División 15th 2008/09 Segunda División Champions === Former position === * 1953/54 : Segunda División - 11th / Group B * 1954/55 : Segunda División - 6th / Group B * 1955/56 : Segunda División - 12th / Group B * 1956/57 : Segunda División - 10th / Group B * 1957/58 : Segunda División - 16th / Group B * 1967/68 : Segunda División - 12th / Group B * 1971/72 : Segunda División - 19th * 1982/83 : Segunda División - 19th * 1986/87 : Segunda División - 18th * 1987/88 : Segunda División - 9th * 1988/89 : Segunda División - 12th * 1989/90 : Segunda División - 10th * 1990/91 : Segunda División - 20th * 1997/98 : Segunda División - 21st Category:Spanish football clubs Category:Jerez de la Frontera Category:1947 establishments in Europe Category:1940s establishments in Spain
title: Xerez CD
